course.subject: CENG
course.name: Advanced Separation Processes
course.description: Separation of gaseous and liquid mixtures by adsorption. Affinity chromatography. Membrane separation technology: reverse osmosis, ultrafiltration. Electrophoresis and other product recovery methods.

reviews.author: aroxas23
reviews.comment_content: The course is about various advanced techniques of separation processes, particularly the physics and chemistry behind each technique and the applications.
reviews.comment_teaching: The teaching style is traditional and feels like a UG course.
reviews.comment_grading: Grade will heavily depend on the final exam. If you do not study well for the final exam, there is a great chance that you will get a low grade.
reviews.comment_workload: There are at least three assignment distributed throughout the whole semester. This is a course with a moderate workload if studying for the final exam will be accounted for.

reviews.author: Bohr
reviews.title: Good PG course!
reviews.comment_content:
Adsorption:
Introduction of adsorption
Adsorption of single component and practical apporaches
Adsorption for multi-component system
Adsorption kinetics:
Introduction
Single particle (Derive PDE)
Adsorption dynamics:
Bed profiles
Breakthrough curves

Membrane separation (mass transfer 野)
Introduction
Reverse osmosis
reviews.comment_teaching:
個content 都幾多數學下
同埋D野都好實用 recommend 大家去sit 下堂

For math part, 佢會係堂上derive d equation既
(要用MATH 2011, CENG 3220 d techniques)
要識derive PDE 但5洗識solve
